title: Scorpia's offspring (monster)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Scorpia's offspring are tiny scorpions that inhabit Scorpia's cave. Their Ranged attack is incredibly accurate and drains Prayer for every splash.

content:
This article is about the monster found in Scorpia's cave. For pet dropped by Scorpia, see Scorpia's offspring.
 This article has a Slayer task guide here.
Information comparing locations for Slayer tasks will be on this page

Monster ID6616

Scorpia's offspring are tiny scorpions that inhabit Scorpia's cave. Their Ranged attack is incredibly accurate and drains Prayer for every splash.

'''Scorpia's offspring''' are tiny scorpions that inhabit [[Scorpia]]'s cave. Their [[Ranged]] attack is incredibly accurate and drains [[Prayer]] for every splash.
